comments.author: @NorfarPS3
comments.text:
I like this idea man, and ill tell you why... 

I know I've told you before but I came from L0114R's channel. he made a vid talking about how you need people for a commentator challenge. I didn't enter, i wanted to watch some of the vids and hear the feedback. I ended up not just subbing, but enjoying your personality and content. I really like the video about the trucks smashing into that bridge, and occasionally I go to your channel and watch vids that I missed. 

what I'm saying is, it's never been about the gameplay. I got people I go to for gameplay, and I got people I got to for personality. so gameplay or not, I'll be watching. 

I think you had a little over 2k subs when I found your channel. your growth has been crazy. 10k here we go.
